item.title: Xbox Developers Direct Us: Insider Gaming Weekly Podcast
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/xbox-developers-direct-us-insider-gaming-weekly-podcast/

Hello everyone, and welcome to Insider Gaming Weekly: A Video Game Podcast. Each and every Friday, myself (Mike Straw) along with my co-senior editor Grant Taylor-Hill and senior producer Albert Perkins as we discuss the latest in video game news, events, rumors and more.

From friendly debates to challenges for the audience, you don’t want to miss a single thing from Insider Gaming Weekly. Even Insider Gaming Co-Founder Tom Henderson will stop by from time to time to talk the latest in gaming rumors that players need to know about.

The Debut Episode

It’s the debut edition of Insider Gaming Weekly: A Video Game Podcast. Mike Straw, Grant Taylor-Hill, and Albert Perkins talk the Xbox Developer Direct, Assassin’s Creed Shadows previews, Dragon Age’s shortcomings, and even dive into the latest rumors with Tom Henderson.

Oh, and we find out what classic franchise Grant has never played…

There’s also the first round of our guessing competition where you have to guess the game three specific sounds come from. Correct answers will be entered into a future raffle for game of your choice. Submit your sound competition entries or leave your feedback at ⁠[email protected]⁠.

And don’t forget to share the show and leave a rating to help us grow this new venture.

See you on the inside!

Subscribe To Insider Gaming Weekly

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5ZUR0ceSgsypXkiCjCCNMa

Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/insider-gaming-weekly-a-video-game-podcast/id1792334405

iHeartRadio: https://www.iheart.com/podcast/269-insider-gaming-weekly-a-vi-260791941/

Amazon Music: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/af55ef9d-5255-4f72-a2a0-50bf333e8dc4/insider-gaming-weekly-a-video-game-podcast

Insider Gaming Weekly airs every Friday, and is available on YouTube, Spotify, Apple Podcasts, iHeartRadio, and Amazon Music. The show will also be on more platforms in the near future.

For more Insider Gaming, check out the release date and story trailer for South of Midnight and find out what classic franchise just had a new game announced.  And don’t forget to sign up for our newsletter.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.
